title.en: Isekai de Seijo ni Natta no de Kokumin-teki Idol wo Mezashimasu

altTitles.ja: 異世界で聖女になったので国民的アイドルを目指します

altTitles.en: You Can't Lie to the Saintess
You Can't Lie to a Saint

description.en: Chloe, who works as an apprentice priestess in a remote church, is a money-loving girl who makes a lot of money at night by gambling at cards, using her insight and memory as weapons. When Erald, a rich holy knight, visits her, he asks her to infiltrate the church as a candidate for sainthood and find the murderer who committed a murder two years ago…?
description.ja: 辺境の教会で神官見習いとして働くクロエは、持ち前の洞察力と記憶力を武器に、夜な夜なカード賭博で荒稼ぎするお金大好き少女。そんな彼女のもとを訪れた成金聖騎士エラルドは、「聖女候補として大教会に潜入し、二年前の殺人事件の犯人を見つけてほしい」とクロエに依頼をして‥‥！？

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
description.ja: 祓清は史上最強の悪祓士（エクソシスト）。弱冠16歳にして初任務にあたっていた。しかし、本当は超ビビり＋ド級の人見知りで…!?　ほんの少しの勇気を胸に、悪魔を祓え!!
description.es-la: El exorcista más poderoso de la historia--¡Kiyoshi! Para poder proteger aquello que considera precioso, Kiyoshi ha obtenido una fuerza sin igual. Pero tiene un secreto que no puede revelar... ¡Conviértete en una espada que corta el mal! ¡Se un escudo que protege a los débiles! ¡Todo eso y más se junta en esta nueva serie de exorcismo, batallas y comedia!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!

title.en: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei LoveCome

altTitles.ja: 英雄と魔女の転生ラブコメ

altTitles.ja-ro: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei Rabu Kome

altTitles.en: A Reincarnation Romantic Comedy of a Hero and a Witch

altTitles.vi: Chuyện tình lãng mạn và hài hước của Anh Hùng và Phù Thủy chuyển sinh
Chuyện tình chuyển sinh hài hước của Anh hùng và Phù thuỷ

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Comédia Romântica de Reencarnação entre um Herói e uma Feiticeira

description.en:
Choose the world or choose her. 

Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. 

However, that was a story of his past life. 

In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
description.ja:
世界を選ぶか、彼女を選ぶか。

平凡な高校生・白石護道には『秘密』があった。それは前世の記憶を持っていること。こことは違う別の世界で、人類を救った『英雄』だった。

とはいえ、あくまで前世の話。

今世ではごく普通の学生生活――のはずだったが、転入してきた少女・椎名麻衣の出現で日々は一変する。
description.vi:
Shiraishi Godou, một cậu học sinh cao trung bình thường đang có một "Bí mật". Đó là cậu vẫn còn ký ức của tiền thế.
Ở một thế giới khác, Godou đã từng là "Anh hùng" giải cứu nhân loại. Tuy là vậy, nhưng đó là chuyện của tiền thế. Ở thế giới hiện tại, cậu chắc là đang trải qua quãng đời học sinh bình thường, vậy mà sự xuất hiện của cô thiếu nữ vừa chuyển trường đến. Shiina Mai đã làm những ngày yên bình của cậu hoàn toàn thay đổi
description.pt-br: O estudante comum de ensino médio Shiraishi Godo guardava um "segredo", ele possuía memórias de uma vida passada. Em um mundo diferente deste, ele foi um "herói" que salvou a humanidade. Mas isso era uma história de sua vida passada. Nesta vida, Godo deveria ter uma vida escolar comum. Isso até a chegada da nova aluna Mai Shiina, que virou tudo de cabeça para baixo. Ela não era apenas uma aluna transferida. Mai era a reencarnação de Celis, a Feiticeira da Calamidade, sua mortal inimiga de vidas passadas. E ela estava lá, não por vingança, mas por algo mais — algo que mudaria o curso da vida de Godo mais uma vez. Agora, ele deve navegar pelas complexidades de suas memórias reencarnadas, sua crescente conexão com Mai e a escolha impossível entre uma vida pacífica e uma cheia de caos mágico.

description.en: A twisted beastman omegaverse BL story about a wolf beastman's master and a serious older office worker! Seiichiro Tanao was an ordinary office worker who lived a diligent and serious life, hiding a certain desire. However, one day, Tanao won the lottery and got 1 billion yen. He took the outrageous step of buying Tsuyuaki, a wolf beastman he found in the park, for 100 million yen. He then asked Tsuyuaki to fulfill his desire.
description.es:
¡Un BL Omegaverse cargado de pasión entre un imponente hombre lobo y un asalariado serio y mayor!
Seiichirō Tanao es un asalariado común que ha llevado una vida seria y trabajadora, ocultando en silencio un "cierto deseo" que lo atormenta.
Pero su destino cambia radicalmente cuando un día gana 10 mil millones de yenes en la lotería. Lleno de determinación, Tanao toma una decisión audaz: comprar a Rōmei, un hombre lobo humanoide que encuentra en un parque, por la impactante suma de 100 millones de yenes.
En un intento de liberar sus emociones reprimidas, le pide a Rōmei que lo ayude a cumplir sus más profundos anhelos...


Nota:
10億円 (10 oku yen) = 10 × 100 millones = 1,000 millones de yenes.
1億円 (1 oku yen) = 100 millones de yenes.

altTitles.ja: 全部盗まれるアンデットちゃん
全く威厳が保てない狼ちゃん
異世界車中泊物語 アウトランナーPHEV
Sleeping Overnight In My Car In Isekai

altTitles.en: Otherworldly Overnight in the Car: Outrunner PHEV

description.en:
One young salaryman, who adores his plug-in, hybrid car that uses both electricity and gasoline, had been using camping in it as an escape plan from everyday life. Suddenly, he finds himself transported to another world with his car!

He'll start his life anew in this different world!
description.ja: やさぐれて会社での評価も低いサラリーマン・大前現人（おおまえあらと）。仕事のミスが理由で車に乗って逃亡し、サービスエリアで車中泊して起きたら異世界へ転移してた！そこで出会ったケモミミ娘に仕事観で説教され逆切れした主人公の異世界での前途は如何に！？異世界でのサバイバルで鍛えられたメンタルで、現代日本での仕事で活かせるか！？リアルと異世界の行き来で生き直す！これはそんな物語です。

description.en:
Isshiki falls in love with a maiden who is pure and innocent, but he has been possessed by Asmodeus, the demon of lust. The demon tries to arouse Isshiki by stimulating the sexual desires of the girls around him in every possible way. However, in order to exorcise the demon and avoid the girls' suspicions, Isshiki must never get excited, no matter how lewd they may act!

"How can I stand this...!"
description.ja: 純潔を貫く乙女に恋をした主人公・一色は、よりにもよって色欲の悪魔アスモデウスに憑りつかれてしまった。悪魔はあの手この手で乙女たちの性欲を刺激して一色を興奮させようとしてくる。しかし、乙女に嫌われないためにも悪魔を祓うためにも一色は絶対に興奮してはならない……たとえそれがどんなに淫らな行為だとしても！「こんなの我慢できるわけ……っ！」エロスとピュア、究極のせめぎ合いラブコメ開戦！

altTitles.ja: 城下町のダンデライオン

description.en:
In the manga's story, the everyday lives of the nine super-powered siblings of the royal family are monitored by more than 200 surveillance cameras and broadcast nationwide. The people of the nation who are watching the broadcast will have the ability to elect the next monarch. The story focuses on Akane, the third-oldest sister who can manipulate gravity. She is shy and desperately does not want to be caught on camera.

**NOTE:** Initially released as a 4-koma manga, Joukamachi no Dandelion has transitioned back to traditional format as of Vol.5 Chapter 49.
Jiseo, born with the fate of the second child of God. Hyunjin, who appeared before Jiseo as he lamented his fate, tries to help him but ends up being possessed by a ghost...

In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。 『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

title.en: Watashi ga Shinde Manzoku desu ka?

altTitles.ja-ro: 私が死んで満足ですか？

altTitles.en: Now That I'm Dead, Are You Satisfied?

description.en: Countess Rorona Ryus died in an accident. The news came the day after her fiancé, Bellveut, called off their engagement. Rorona was accused of mistreating her sister, a crime she had no right to be accused of, but she accepted the blame without hesitation. She was found dead in an overturned carriage on a suburban street, her face smashed in. When Rorona's sister learned of her death, she was delighted. "Bellveut is now hers," she said. Bellveut laughed. I wish she had died sooner. But they did not know that Rorona's death would bring them more than just good fortune.....
description.ja: 伯爵令嬢ロロナ・リュースが事故死した。その知らせが舞い込んだのは、彼女が婚約者である王太子に婚約破棄を告げられた翌日のことだった。妹を虐げたなどと、いわれなき罪で糾弾されながら、その咎めをあっさり受け入れたロロナ。彼女は郊外の街道で横転した馬車の中、顔の潰れた遺体となって発見されたという。その死を知ったロロナの妹は喜んだ。「これで王太子は自分のもの」と。王太子は笑った。「もっと早く死んでくれればよかったのに」と。しかし、彼らは知らなかった。ロロナの死がもたらすものは、幸運だけではないということを……。

description.en: A 4-koma about the lives of the youkai at Youkai-Academy

Tatsuhiko Shiroyama hates being stuck in the boonies. Greetings from strangers feels fake, part-time job prospects are limited, and he's been "blessed" with the nickname "Niyayama" from his classmates due to his creepy, unsociable attempts at smiling. He turned to the radio as a means to escape, and thinks about nothing more than saving up for a move to Tokyo where he can explore his passions. But Tatsuhiko's life changes forever when he saves a rich CEO from a rice paddy and is set up with his granddaughter, the equally as shy and antisocial Tamiko Mita. Together, the two stumble through the nuances of "dating", and Tatsuhiko's dreary days become a whole lot brighter.

It's been 10 years since Takamichi reincarnated in hell. His Incubus power becomes stronger by having sex with women, but his growth peaked. 

"I'll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!"

Sexy & violent pretty girl battle fantasy!
description.ja: タカミチは魔界に転生して10年。魔界最強の大魔剣士で次期魔王の座すら譲られるほどになっていた…が、悩んでいた。女性との行為によって強くなる『インキュバス』のスキルツリーは既に行き詰まっていたのだ。インキュバスのスキルツリーを解き明かすため、意を決してゲートをくぐるタカミチを待っていたのは…薬師の美少女アウラや魔眼の暗殺者バイオレットとの…エッロすぎる出会いだった（笑）
description.pt-br: 10 anos desde que ele reencarnou no inferno ... O herói “Takamichi” está com problemas. Com o poder do “Incubus” de ficar mais forte fazendo sexo com mulheres, ele já não tinha mais inimigos e seu crescimento atingiu o pico. “Vou me mudar para uma nova área, esperem por mim, lindas mulheres do novo mundo!” Fantasia de batalha de menina bonita sexy e violenta!

title.en: Its Not My Fault for Being Delicious

altTitles.zh-ro: Meiwei you bushi wo de cuo

description.en: Bai Qian Qian, a human, fell into the demon world and became an ingredient! Now the handsome looking demons want to eat her!!! QAQ In order to survive, she signed a contract with the bamboo demon Xia Zhu and became his main ingredient... Wait, something's not right. Shit, is this what love feels like?
description.zh: 漫画简介: 人类少女白茜茜，误入妖界秒变食材！妖怪都是帅哥，各个都想吃掉她QAQ?为生存她与竹妖夏竹缔结契约，成为他的专属食材……等等，似乎有什么不对？糟糕，好像是心动的感觉！

description.es-la: En un mundo donde las apariencias suelen engañar, vive una cucaracha muy especial. Con su aspecto adorable, esta pequeña cucaracha se destaca entre las demás. A diferencia de sus congéneres, a ella le encanta estar cerca de los humanos, a pesar de que no siempre la traten de la mejor manera.

altTitles.ja: もふもふと異世界冒険メシ

description.ja: 虚弱体質だった会社員・佐野樹はいつも体の内側に熱を持つ感覚を抱いていた。そして、繁忙期と熱の暴走が重なって倒れてしまう。すると女神様が現れ、彼に伝える。生まれるべき世界を間違えた。熱の原因は魔力で、魔力のない世界で魔力を持って生まれてしまったのだと……。女神様の力で願い通りの健康な体に加え、人一倍の魔力を持って異世界に生まれ変わったイツキ。そして、授かった卵から生まれた伝説の魔獣を相棒に、冒険者として第二の人生を歩み始める……！

title.en: Otomege Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu

altTitles.vi: Thế Giới Otomegame Thật Khắc Nghiệt Với Nhân Vật Quần Chúng

altTitles.th: ชีวิตตัวประกอบอย่างตูช่างอยู่ยากเมื่ออยู่ในโลกเกมจีบหนุ่ม

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲー世界はモブに厳しい世界です

altTitles.ko: 여성향 게임 세계는 엑스트라에게 어려운 세상입니다

altTitles.ja-ro: Otome Game Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu

altTitles.ru: Мир отомэ-игр — это тяжёлый мир для мобов

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Dating Sim: The World of Otome Games Is Tough for Mobs

altTitles.fr: Mon Destin... Entre Les Mains Des Femmes

altTitles.zh-hk: 女性向遊戲世界對路人角色很不友好

altTitles.en: The World of Otome Games Is Tough for Mobs

description.en: Leon, a former Japanese worker, was reincarnated into an “otome game” world, and despaired at how it was a world where females hold dominance over males. It was as if men were just livestock that served as stepping stones for females in this world. The only exceptions were the game’s romantic targets, a group of handsome men led by the crown prince. In these bizarre circumstances, Leon held one weapon: his knowledge from his previous world, where his brazen sister had forced him to complete this game. This is a story about his adventure to survive and thrive in this world.
description.ja:
転生したら「女尊男卑」な、乙女ゲー世界でした!!!

モブからだって成り上がれ！
イケメン死すべし！
剣と魔法の異世界ファンタジー!!!

▼
剣と魔法の“乙女ゲー"の世界に転生した、
元日本の社会人だったリオンは、その女尊男卑な世界に絶望する。

この世界では、男なぞは女性を養うだけの家畜のようなものであった。
例外なのは、ゲームで攻略対象であった王太子率いるイケメン軍団ぐらいである。

そんな理不尽な境遇において、リオンはある一つの武器を持っていた。
前世で生意気な妹に無理矢理攻略させられていたこのゲームの知識である。

本当は田舎に引きこもりのんびりとしたいリオンだったが
その知識を使い、やりたい放題の女どもとイケメンに、はからずも反旗を翻すのだった。
ド外道主人公による、爽快(?)下克上ファンタジー、コミカライズでも開演!

(Source: コミックウォーカー)
description.pt-br: Leon, um ex-trabalhador japonês, reencarnou em um mundo de “otome game” e se desesperou com a forma como era um mundo onde as mulheres detêm o domínio sobre os homens. Era como se os homens fossem apenas animais que serviram como degraus para as fêmeas neste mundo. As únicas exceções eram os alvos românticos do jogo, um grupo de homens bonitos liderados pelo príncipe herdeiro. Nestas circunstâncias bizarras, Leon tem apenas uma arma: seu conhecimento do seu mundo anterior, que ele obteve após completar o jogo, depois de ser forçado por sua irmã a jogá-lo. Leon, que realmente só quer viver tranquilamente na periferia do país, usa seu conhecimento para bater de frente contra as mulheres e esses homens bonitos.

description.en: Min Hu Chu, a guy who lives to eat and So Geum Ji, a girl who eats to live. They’re both childhood friends but with complete different opinions on the purpose of food. Focusing on these two characters, introducing a story that includes recipes to make alone(?) and their campus life(!) The author of ‘Second Lead Complex’, Soi’s beginning of a new series!
description.ko: 먹기 위해 사는 민후추와 살기 위해 먹는 소금지. 소꼽친구지 만 음식에 대한 가치관이 전혀 다른 두 사람. 둘을 중심으로 펼 쳐지는 자취 요리(?)와 캠퍼스 라이프(!) 서브 콤플렉스 소이 작가의 신작!

description.en:
This is a relaxing comedy manhua with cute penguins as the MCs. Some of them are shy, some are loveable, some are mischievous... But they all have short arms and legs with no waist. Even though it's not easy living in the Antarctic with its cold weather and slippery floors, they make do by catching fish, playing, and waiting for their happiness. 

"I'm very terrified, but if I love you enough, I'll find the courage to confess. If I can't get your response the first time, then I'll try a hundred times, a thousand times, even ten thousand times."

Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?

altTitles.ja: ブルーブラッドヴァンパイア

description.en: Azure, the founding father of vampires who has lived since time immemorial, is challenged to a fight by Shuuya, a vampire hunter who makes no effort to conceal his hostility. Interest piqued, Azure proposes a game. Should Shuuya come to love Azure by the time the red spider lilies wither, he shall become a bride. Should Shuuya’s feelings remain unchanged, his wish shall be granted. What will become of Shuuya, fiancé to the strongest vampire...!?

Minato Usami is a high-school girl with a new little brother from her father's remarriage.
Having high expectations after being told that her new brother is an adorable little boy, Koshiro—said little brother—turns out to be a little different than she imagined.
description.ja: 父親の再婚で小学生の弟ができることになった女子高生の宇佐美みなと。 「とってもかわいい男の子だぞ」と言われ、期待を膨らませるが―――。 『月曜から金曜の男子高校生』の森つぶみがおくる、笑って泣ける、ほのぼのホームコメディ、開幕！

description.en: There exists an old rumor relating to cats within the ancient capital of Kamakura... that if you go to the "Bakeneko Club", located somewhere in Kamakura, you can meet cats that have gone missing. Even today, people wander into "Kamakura Neko Club", where Maya and Gakuto work, relying on this rumor.

University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?
Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka o Tamemasu

altTitles.ja: 老後に備えて異世界で８万枚の金貨を貯めます

altTitles.en: Saving 80,000 Gold in Another World for My Retirement

altTitles.ko: 노후를 대비해 이세계에서 금화 8만 개를 모읍니다

altTitles.zh: 为了养老金，去异界存八万金！

altTitles.zh-hk: 為了養老金，去異界存八萬金！

altTitles.fr: Économiser 80,000 pièces d'or dans un autre monde pour ma retraite

altTitles.ru: Сохранение 80 000 золотых монет в другом мире для моей старости

altTitles.es: Ahorre 80 000 monedas de oro en otro mundo en preparación para mi jubilación

description.en: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she's always dreamed of!
description.ja: 山野ミツハは18歳でありながら中学生に見られてしまう童顔小柄な少女。高校卒業を目前にして両親と頼れる兄を一度に失い、いきなり天涯孤独の身になってしまう。ショックで大学受験にも失敗して途方に暮れていたミツハは、たまたま謎の存在から「世界間転移」という能力を与えられる。そこから彼女が思いついた将来設計は、世間一般の常識の斜め上をいっていた──!!
description.pt-br: Uma garota de 18 anos que perdeu sua família em um acidente, Yamano Mitsuha cai de um penhasco em um dia qualquer e é transportada para um mundo diferente com uma civilização ao nível da Europa Medieval. Mitsuha descobre que é possível ir e retornar à terra após uma luta mortal com lobos. Assim, ela decide viver em ambos os mundos. “Para ter segurança na velhice, eu vou mirar em alcançar 80.000 moedas de ouro!” “Tentarei não deixar coisas estranhas circularem para não distorcer o progresso do mundo, mas não vou me conter pelo bem da minha vida fácil e segura!” Enquanto usa três pistolas junto com palavras e ações que parecem decentes, em sua cabeça Yamano Mitsuha é uma garota esperta. Fazendo um esforço para ganhar dinheiro mesmo com um pequeno corpo que parece uma criança para os ocidentais!

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him?
description.ja: ２度目の結婚記念日。仕事を終えて帰宅した和光市路が目撃したのは見知らぬ男と交わる妻の姿だった──！住み慣れた我が家、幸福な日々、そして愛する人を失った和光だったが、そんな彼の前に現れたのは…！？
description.vi: Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, Wakou Ichiro về nhà sớm để kỷ niệm 2 năm ngày cưới với vợ mình. Nhưng bất ngờ khi mở cửa ra thì... Anh phát hiện vợ mình đang làm tình với người đàn ông khác. Cuộc hôn nhân dù ngắn nhưng cũng làm cuộc sống của anh thay đổi một lần nữa. Bất ngờ một cô gái xuất hiện trước mặt anh, câu truyện vừa hài vừa lứng sẽ bắt đầu?
description.es-la: La historia empieza con el protagonista, Wakou Ichiro, quien decida regresar temprano a casa del trabajo para celebrar su segundo aniversario con su esposa. Pero, cuando abre la puerta de su casa... ¡Se encuentra a su esposa siéndole infiel! A pesar de que matrimonio duró muy poco, su vida vuelve a cambiar cuando de repente, frente a él se aparece cierta mujer... ¡Así comienza una nueva historia, una nueva comedía erótica!

description.en: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
description.es-la: Gu Feiyan, el tercer soberano, muere y es reencarnado en un niño llamado Li Yunxia, una completa basura que todavía no despertó sus meridianos a pesar de su edad. ¡Pero esto no detendrá al MC de alcanzar el pináculo de este mundo otra vez!
description.pt-br: Um dos imperadores marciais conferidos, Gu Feiyang, faleceu nas montanhas Tiandang e reencarnou 15 anos depois como Li Yunxiao, do estado de Tianshui, embarcando em uma jornada que desafia o céu contra os inúmeros gênios da época. Os nove níveis da Arte Marcial; os Reinos Divinos dos dez quadrantes. A partir de então, o mundo inteiro caiu no caos!

altTitles.en: Don't Mess with the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/dennou319)  
- [Mangaka's YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIhPflgXxYM9dsOzaI0sYgA)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://eizouken-anime.com/)  
- [Official Live-Action (JP)](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

altTitles.ja: 明日ちゃんのセーラー服

description.en: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!
description.es:
Akebi Komichi vive en una zona rural con su familia y acaba de conseguir entrar en la famosa Academia de secundaria Roubai, a la que ya asistió su madre. Como ella, le gustaría llevar el clásico uniforme de marinero, que ya no es el habitual en la Academia.

Después de conseguir que le permitan llevar su ansiado uniforme cosido por su madre, Akebi empezará su vida en secundaria con el objetivo de hacer muchas amigas. El paso tranquilo del tiempo, la inocencia y la naturalidad, marcarán la vida de Akebi y sus amigas.
description.ja: その“初めて”を“何度でも”──。　舞台は、田舎の名門女子中学・私立ロウ梅学園。この学園のセーラー服を着ることが「夢」だった明日小路（あけびこみち）。少女の「夢」の中学セーラー服ライフが始まる♪　広がる、緑豊かな田園風景。ゆっくり流れる青春時間。
description.es-la: El escenario es la Academia Privada Roubai, una prestigiosa escuela secundaria femenina del país. Para Akebi Komichi, ponerse el uniforme de marinera de esta escuela es un sueño hecho realidad. Su vida de ensueño en la escuela secundaria por fin comienza. Las verdes vistas del campo abierto. El lento fluir del tiempo de la juventud. Con un suave toque, el genial artista Hiro te trae este sencillo cuento escolar... ¡ahora se matricula!
description.pt-br:
A história se passa na prestigiosa Academia Roubai, uma escola secundária para garotas, no Japão. 

Nossa amável Akebi Komichi, a protagonista, entrou na academia com o sonho de vestir o lindo uniforme Sailor, porém, ela se surpreende no seu primeiro dia. O que será que aconteceu? Akebi ainda viverá muitas experiências em Roubai até se tornar uma idol como sua cantora favorita Miki-chan! Avante Akebi!

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 23. ]

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...

title.en: Tsundere na Watakushi ga Kawaii Nante Shouki Desu ka?

altTitles.ja: ツンデレなわたくしが可愛いなんて正気ですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsundere na Watakushi ga Kawaii Nante Shoki Desuka?

altTitles.en: Are You Serious Thinking a Tsundere Like Me Is Cute?

description.en:
Rose, a prideful and spoiled princess, is known for her arrogance and lack of charm, making her widely disliked. After a life-changing event, she decides to turn her life around and make amends for her past behavior. Her first step? Breaking off her engagement with her kind and supportive fiancé, Rein, to free him from being tied to someone like her.

However, to Rose's surprise, Rein doesn't react as she expects. Instead, he openly declares: "I can't help but find you irresistibly cute." Confused and flustered, Rose struggles to understand his feelings while grappling with her own emotions.

This romantic comedy explores themes of personal growth, self-worth, and unexpected love, all wrapped in the quirky charm of a tsundere protagonist.
description.ja:
わがままで傲慢で可愛げがない――嫌われ者の王女ローズはある出来事をきっかけに改心すると決意した。
手始めに婚約者のレインを自分から解放するため婚約破棄を言い渡す。しかし彼の返事は思いも寄らないもので……？
「生憎私には、あなたが可愛く思えて仕方ないのです」
あなた、正気ですか……！？

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

title.en: Watashi no Hara no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Tai no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.vi: Con quái vật trong tử cung của tôi

description.en:
***Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.***

Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends, and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. 

However, on her period, Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor, and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice, but when she became aware of it, the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature.

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 貴方の中の“悪意”を目覚めさす。衝撃のサスペンス!!優等生で、先生からの信頼も厚い女子中学生の神城千夏。友達とも仲良く、誰のことも嫌いになんてならない幸せな日々を過ごしていた…はずだった。しかし、千夏は気づいてしまった。担任の塚本のことが嫌いだと、周りに対してとてもいらいらしていることを。フタをして、見ないふりをしていた自分の気持ちを自覚した時、千夏の中にいた“化け物”が暴れ出し、本性を現し始めた。
description.vi:
Sẽ ra sao nếu một ngày những biến cố, bất công của cuộc đời liên tiếp ập đến, để rồi đánh thức con ác ma đang trú ngụ trong trái tim bạn?
Kamishiro Chinatsu, nữ sinh cấp hai, là một học sinh giỏi, đồng thời còn là lớp trưởng được giáo viên hết mực tín nhiệm. Một cô bé hòa đồng với bạn bè và trải qua những ngày vui vẻ mà không ghét lấy một ai.
Tuy nhiên, Chinatsu nhận thấy cảm xúc căm ghét của cô bé dành cho Tsukada, giáo viên chủ nhiệm của mình đang một lớn dần, đến mức khiến cô bé chán ghét tất cả mọi thứ xung quanh. Nhận ra chuyện này, cô bé đã tìm cách che đậy và quay lưng lại với nó. Nhưng rồi "con quái vật" vốn trú ngụ bên trong Chinatsu bắt đầu hành động và bộc lộ bản chất thật của mình, thứ mà cô bé đã luôn muốn trốn tránh.

title.en: The Immoral Duke Needs to be Homeschooled

altTitles.en: Immoral Duke's Family Needs to be Homeschooled

description.en:
You three kids, I’ll teach you.

Recently, there have been several changes in my life.

The first is that I became the governess of Lord Bertha’s siblings, and the second is that I remembered my past life. 

Why did I recall my past life now? Could this be inside the novel I read in my past life? 

If I remember correctly, I, “Estella,” the governess, will soon die. All to protect the half-siblings from that immoral man, “Diego”! 

“You seem like a more capable person than I thought.” 
“You’d better look for a job at another estate because you’ll go crazy if you stay here.” 

But “Diego,” the man who I thought was a heartless psychopath, turns out to be surprisingly kind…? 

Alright, I’m going to organize a dramatic reconciliation between Diego and his half-siblings!! How could you possibly kill these adorable kids when they’re hugging you?!

After breaking up with her trashy ex-boyfriend, Jung Eunkyo spends her days peacefully running a café with her friend Kim Haeda. But then, someone appears to disturb her calm life.

“Sunbae, I like you. I fell in love with you at first sight.”

Lee Jaeheon, a young, handsome man who seems to have a twisted side. Eunkyo begins to feel attracted to Jaeheon, who approaches her without hesitation... But Eunkyo’s life, which was already shaken by this new relationship, gradually begins to experience greater turmoil.

(18+ version)
description.fr:
Après avoir rompu avec son ex-petit ami peu recommandable, Jung Eunkyo passe ses journées paisiblement à gérer un café avec son amie Kim Haeda. 

Mais un jour, quelqu’un vient troubler sa vie tranquille.
« Sunbae, je t’aime. Je suis tombé amoureux de toi au premier regard. »
Lee Jaeheon, un jeune homme séduisant qui semble cacher un côté sombre. Eunkyo commence à se sentir attirée par Jaeheon, qui l’approche sans hésitation… Mais la vie d’Eunkyo, déjà bouleversée par cette nouvelle relation, commence peu à peu à connaître des troubles encore plus profonds.
description.pt-br:
Depois de terminar com seu ex-namorado desprezível, Jung Eunkyo passa seus dias pacificamente administrando um café com seu amigo Kim Haeda. Mas então, alguém aparece para perturbar sua vida calma.

“Sunbae, eu gosto de você. Eu me apaixonei por você à primeira vista.”

Lee Jaeheon, um jovem bonito que parece ter um lado distorcido. Eunkyo começa a se sentir atraído por Jaeheon, que se aproxima dela sem hesitação... Mas a vida de Eunkyo, que já estava abalada por esse novo relacionamento, gradualmente começa a experimentar uma turbulência maior.

description.en:
Tang Ran is a bright and cheerful little fox spirit. To graduate from the Monster Academy, she transforms into a human college student hoping to seduce a human and make them fall in love with her. However, little does she know that the reserved human female professor she has a crush on, Su Qingci, is actually a…

One lie leads to another. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox must spin an endless web of “lies.”

As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

description.en:
The exorcist fell in love with me, a ghost...?!

A survival love story of a ghost who resorted to a false confession to survive from the exorcist.
description.ko:
퇴마사가 귀신인 나에게 반해버렸다...?! 
퇴마사로부터 살아남기 위해 거짓 고백을 해버린 한 귀신의 생존 서바이벌 연애기
description.ru: Вы бы признались кому-то в любви, если бы это означало спасение вашей жизни? Ну, это то, что я сделал. Я призрак по имени Умин, а моя девушка - охотница за привидениями. Довольно банально, я знаю... Честно говоря, я не знаю, как мне избавиться от нее, но я не могу позволить ей просто убить меня!

description.en:
High school student Li Huowang possesses an ability: whenever he closes his eyes, he enters a bizarre cultivation world. In that strange world, he is captured by someone who calls him “Master” and is made into a living medicine—a human cauldron that could be turned into a pill at any moment.

In the real world, however, Li Huowang is a mentally ill patient living in a psychiatric hospital, unable to attend school. The doctors tell him that the bizarre cultivation world is nothing but a hallucination.

Now, caught between reality and illusion, truth and lies, Li Huowang breaks down, crying and shouting:
“Mom, I really can’t tell what’s real anymore!”
description.pt-br: Li Huowang, um estudante do ensino médio, possui uma habilidade peculiar: sempre que fecha os olhos, ele entra em um mundo de cultivo bizarro. Nesse mundo estranho, ele é capturado por alguém que o chama de “Mestre” e acaba transformado em uma medicina viva — um humano…

title.en: It's Over! Empress’ Husband is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.th: เรื่องระทึกขวัญของท่านเคาท์เคน

altTitles.ja: 忘れられたジュリエット (Part 1)

altTitles.es: La Julieta Olvidada -La Saga de Cain nº1-
La Eclosión del Joven -La Saga de Cain nº2-
La Marca del Cordero Rojo -La Saga de Cain nº4-

description.en:
Delve into the tortured past of Earl Cain C. Hargreaves, charismatic heir to a wealthy family full of secrets, lies and unthinkable crimes. Follow the young Cain as he attempts to unravel the secrets of his birth, all the while solving each new mystery that comes his way.  
 
---
 
In the Hakushaku Cain Series:  
  
1. Wasurerareta Juliet
Includes 2 oneshots:
   * The Boys Who Stopped Time   
 England, year 1918. Rupert enrolls to his new school just a few days after the murder of a  maid called Noelle. He's the type that just can't sit still, so when he meets Noelle's sister,  he's determined to help her find out who murdered her sister…
   *  Double   
 When they were children, Ren helped his friend Emilio start his career as an actor. But  when Ren didn't have any news from Emilio for two years, he decided to go to New York  to look for his friend…  
2. Shounen no Fukasuru Oto
3. Kafka  
Includes 1 oneshot: Ellie in Summer Clothes  
4. Akai Hitsuji no Kokuin  
5. God Child  
Deep in the heart of 19th Century London, a young nobleman named Cain walks the shadowy cobblestone streets of the aristocratic society in which he was born. Forced to become an Earl upon the untimely death of his father, Cain assumes the role of head of the Hargreaves, a noble family with a dark past. With Riff, his faithful manservant, and Mary Weather, his 10-year-old adopted sister, Cain investigates the mysterious crimes that seem to follow him wherever he goes.
description.es: ¿Puede un shojo resultar tan siniestro como un seinen? ¿Y estar lleno de acción como un shonen? ¿Y aún así, tener todo el romanticismo y la belleza propios del shojo? Sí, si la autora es una artista de la talla de Kaori Yuki. La saga de Cain es un mosaico en varios episodios de las andanzas del conde Cain C. Hergreaves, un coleccionista de venenos del siglo XIX, que se enfrentará a misterios que apuntan a una siniestra organización. Un shojo para el que quiera descubrir su amor por el género.

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.ja: ああ、生きているって素晴らしい

altTitles.en: Ah, It's Wonderful to Be Alive

description.en:
Called a failure by his adoptive parents, bullied at school, ignored by teachers, high school boy Kurogane Rikuto has nowhere to belong neither at home nor at school.
"Life is shit. I guess I'll die." After saying this, he was about to commit suicide by jumping off the school’s roof when suddenly all sorts of monsters started appearing from students' smartphones, transforming the school into a hellscape of screaming agony.

Goblins, orcs, slimes… Everybody has seen them in games: "small fry monsters". However, humans in the real world, where there is no magic, no special abilities, and no leveling up, are devoured by those "small fries" without any means to retaliate. Rikuto, spared from the incident due to his bullies destroying his phone, seeing the students who bullied him and the teachers dying unsightly deaths and the collapse of order, realizes he does have a desire to survive. Just then, a goblin wielding a club attacks him from behind—Thus begins the survival action tale of one insignificant human driven into extreme circumstances.
description.ja:
義両親から出来損ないとバカにされ、学校ではイジメに遭い、教師からは無視され、家にも学校にも居場所がない、男子高校生・黒鉄陸斗（くろがねりくと）。
「人生、クソだな。死ぬか」と学校の屋上から飛び降り自殺をしようとしていたそのとき、突然生徒達のスマホから様々なモンスターが現れ学校は阿鼻叫喚の地獄絵図となる。
ゴブリン、オーク、スライム…、誰もがゲームで一度は見たことがある【雑魚モンスター】。
しかし、魔法も特殊スキルもレベルアップもない現実世界の生身の人間は、その【雑魚モンスター】たちに為す術なく喰われ殺されていく。
不良たちにスマホを壊されていたが故に事なきを得た陸斗は、自分をイジメていた生徒や教師が無様に殺され秩序が崩壊していく様子を目の当たりにし、自らの生きたいという生存欲求に気が付く。
そこへ、背後から棍棒を手にしたゴブリンが襲いかかってきて――。
極限状況に追い詰められたちっぽけな人間のサバイバルパニックアクション開幕。
